title: Transfer news: Harry Kane and Marcus Rashford 'head up Barcelona's four-man January wishlist'
text:
Barcelona have reportedly drawn up a wishlist for January as they hunt a long-term replacement for Luis Suarez.

And it appears that England duo Harry Kane and Marcus Rashford head up the shortlist for the Spanish giants.

Despite scoring six goals so far this season, Suarez turns 33 in January and Barca are looking towards the future of their forward line.

Mundo Deportivo are reporting that Barcelona have lined up four strikers to sign in January

But it's Kane and Rashford who are the surprise inclusions that have been drawn up, according to Mundo Deportivo.

They claim that Kylian Mbappe is 'the big dream' for the Barca board, but there are doubts over whether they would be able to finance a deal in 12 months' time.

Kane is desperate for silverware and believed to be considering his Tottenham future after a dismal start to the season.

Harry Kane is interesting Barcelona as they seek a long-term replacement for Luis Suarez

Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford is viewed as someone for the future

Rashford, at 21, is not viewed on the same pedestal as Kane or Mbappe, but Barca are said to be excited by his potential.

Inter Milan's Lautaro Martinez, 22, is another young attacker attracting their interest.

Martinez has scored six goals in his first 10 games of the season for Inter.
description: Barcelona have reportedly drawn up a wishlist for January as they hunt a long-term replacement for Luis Suarez. And it appears Harry Kane and Marcus Rashford head up the shortlist.
